definitions.definition: A fairy that supposedly appears in animal form, often large.
definitions.example: The pooka had befriended the kindly old man.

definitions.definition: A convenient storage location or hiding spot created by the arrangement or form of surrounding objects
A small, usually perforated, wave- and beach-polished shell fragment formed from the spire of a cone, found along beaches of Pacific islands, and used especially to make necklaces.
